title: Ask Riot on Runes, Splash Art and Buttons

replies.body:
Don't change the rune sytem at all, it's been there since day one instead remove the outdated/unused runes and replace them with other runes that are more usefull.
I noticed the other day I wanted some XP runes but they were only available in quints which there is no way I would be buying expensive xp quints to replace my vital jg quints.
I take cd per level glyphs meaning I now don't have any magic resist so how about hybrid armor/magic resist seals or health/cd reduction per level seals.
"dont change it cuz its old" is not an excuse to leave something that could be alot better in a shitty state. take a leaf from zeds book "tradition is the corpse of wisdom"
Nah mate, Melbounce is on to something. I like the sound of these "health reduction" runes. Could change the state of Olaf forever.
lol health reduction runes, reduce your hp per level{{champion:2}}

Of course, Aatrox has...
Q: 16->12 second cooldown, used for mobility almost never, maxed last
E: 12->8 second cooldown, used for poke and slow pretty much all the time, maxed first or second
(and W: toggle-able three-hit passive, see Riot's post)

Then again changing it now would throw off me and the other two people who play Aatrox.

What are you doing here? No one is supposed to be playing Aatrox!

I don't mind the current runes and masteries system. I am bronze 4 and I see it as a challenge to verse people with better runes and masteries than me. It is how I improve each day. It's up to you riot if you change it or not but I don't mind either way.
